SEARCH
Module LB08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerNetworkObserver, GameObserver, Runnable
public class GameController extends Object implements Runnable, ServerNetworkObserver, GameObserver
This class manages the logic of a game instance. It acts as the central controller for the game, coordinating interactions between players, the game model and the server network.

      Communicates to the players the game is about to start and sends their cards.

    • place

      public void place(ClientHandler client, int placeableCardId, boolean facingUp, int x, int y) throws CannotPlaceCardException
      Places a card on the board for the player associated with the provided ClientHandler.
      Parameters:
      client - The ClientHandler representing the player who wants to place the card.
      placeableCardId - The ID of the card in the player's hand to be placed.
      facingUp - Whether the card should be placed face up (true) or face down (false).
      x - The x-coordinate on the board where the card should be placed.
      y - The y-coordinate on the board where the card should be placed.
      Throws:
      CannotPlaceCardException - Thrown if it's not the player's turn or the card cannot be placed for some reason.

    • directDrawResourceCard

      public void directDrawResourceCard(ClientHandler client) throws NotYourTurnException, EmptyDeckException, FullHandException, CannotDrawException
      Allows the player associated with the ClientHandler to directly draw a resource card from the deck.
      Parameters:
      client - The ClientHandler representing the player who wants to draw a card.
      Throws:
      NotYourTurnException - Thrown if it's not the player's turn.
      EmptyDeckException - Thrown if the resource card deck is empty.
      FullHandException - Thrown if the player's hand is already full.
      CannotDrawException - Thrown if the player hasn't placed a card yet this turn.

    • directDrawGoldCard

      public void directDrawGoldCard(ClientHandler client) throws EmptyDeckException, FullHandException, NotYourTurnException, CannotDrawException
      Allows the player associated with the ClientHandler to directly draw a gold card from the deck.
      Parameters:
      client - The ClientHandler representing the player who wants to draw a card.
      Throws:
      NotYourTurnException - Thrown if it's not the player's turn.
      FullHandException - Thrown if the player's hand is already full.
      CannotDrawException - Thrown if the player hasn't placed a card yet this turn.
      EmptyDeckException

      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • chooseStarterCardSide

      public void chooseStarterCardSide(ClientHandler client, int starterCardId, boolean facingUp)
      Selects the orientation of the starter card and places it.
      Parameters:
      client - The player that selected the orientation.
      starterCardId - The starter card id.
      facingUp - The orientation: true if the front is facing up, false otherwise.
